name: arduinoeditor
description: An external editor based for the Arduino IDE

scripts.build-production: nwb nwbuild -v 0.19.0 -p win32,osx64,linux64 --output-format ZIP --executable-name "Arduino External Editor" --win-ico img/icon.ico --mac-icns img/icon.icns  -o ../AEE_build ./
scripts.build-all-sdk: nwb nwbuild -v 0.19.0-sdk -p win32,osx64,linux64 --executable-name "Arduino External Editor" --win-ico img/icon.ico --mac-icns img/icon.icns --side-by-side -o ../AEE_build ./
scripts.build-win-sdk: nwb nwbuild -v 0.19.0-sdk -p win32 --executable-name "Arduino External Editor" --win-ico img/icon.ico --side-by-side -o ../AEE_build ./
scripts.build-mac-sdk: nwb nwbuild -v 0.19.0-sdk -p osx64 --executable-name "Arduino External Editor" --mac-icns img/icon.icns --side-by-side -o ../AEE_build ./
